text.tspan: Death rate from indoor air pollution vs. per capita energy use, 2019
Death rates from indoor air pollution are measured as the number of deaths per 100,000 individuals.
Death rate from indoor air pollution
Data source: Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation, Global Burden of Disease (2019), U.S. Energy Information Administration
(EIA); Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy (2023)
